channel.title: |Crystal-X| 718+| New server! Come play now!
channel.description:
We are Crystal-X. We are a new server looking for any player of any skill level! You will all be treated EQUALLY! Can you be the richest or strongest player in Crystal-X? We got great monsters with great drops! We are 24/7.. Staff spots are Currently : OPEN Apply either in game or at our forums : [URL=http://"http://www.crystal-xrsps.enjin.com/"]Click here[/URL] Downloadable Client : [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/7s84lglgvx3gnru/Crystal-X2.jar?m"]Click Here[/URL]
Some of the features include!
Godswords... Godwards... Nex... Corp... AOD... Glacors... KBD... TD's... Queen Black dragon 100%... 100% Skills!! 100% Skill capes.. Including Max and Comp cape(with emotes) Donor Zone for Donors Plus loads,load more!! Come find out for youself!!
